dt: {bc}a common Palearctic finch ({it}Emberiza citrinella{/it} of the family Emberizidae) having the male largely {a_link|yellow} and chestnut

et: alteration of earlier {it}yelambre{/it}, from Middle English {it}*yelwambre{/it}, from {it}yelwe{/it} yellow + {it}*ambre{/it} yellowhammer, from Old English {it}amore{/it}; akin to Old High German {it}amaro{/it} yellowhammer, {it}amari{/it} emmer
shortdef: a common Palearctic finch (Emberiza citrinella of the family Emberizidae) having the male largely yellow and chestnut —called also yellow bunting
